page.title: 14The Elderly
page.content: To judge Harborough from an active pensioner's point of view we interviewed Peggy.She lives on the Southern Estate and has been in Harborough for 5 years.She moved here to be nearer her son and daughter-in- law.She enjoys living here but worries that there is not enough for younger people to do that is not too expensive.For her own age group she would like more dances but feels that otherwise there is plenty to do.As for facilities on the Southern Estate she feels that it is in need of a Chemist's shop and Post Office and that there should be improvements in the bus timetabling.Peggy enjoys playing Whist.She has played at Stuart Rd.O.A.P.Club,Little Bowden Whist Club Great Bowden,Harborough Conservative and the Trades and Labour Whist clubs. In the Winter she has bridge lessons.
